text: Nassarius cinctellus is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae, the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks. ==Description== The length of the shell varies between 5 mm and 7.5 mm. ==Distribution== In the Atlantic Ocean of St Helena; in the Red Sea; in the Pacific Ocean off the Philippines. ==References== * Cernohorsky W. O. (1984). Systematics of the family Nassariidae (Mollusca: Gastropoda). Bulletin of the Auckland Institute and Museum 14: 1–356 * Vine, P. (1986). Red Sea Invertebrates. Immel Publishing, London. 224 pp Category:Nassariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1852
title: Nassarius cinctellus
